Welcome

I'm currently a fourth year Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Computer Science at University of California, Irvine working with Prof. Ardalan Amiri Sani. I received my B.Sc. degree in computer engineering from Sharif University of Technology.

Research Interests:

  • Mobile Computing
  • Privacy and Security
  • Operating Systems
